thread.title: Simon Cowell and Ant and Dec rush to help collapsed Britain's Got Talent contestant
thread.title_full: Simon Cowell and Ant and Dec rush to help collapsed Britain's Got Talent contestant

author: Hayley Minn
title: Simon Cowell and Ant and Dec rush to help collapsed Britain's Got Talent contestant
text:
Simon Cowell and Ant and Dec rush to help collapsed Britain's Got Talent contestant Luke fell while he was singing My Way by Frank Sinatra Share Simon and Ant and Dec Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Britain’s Got Talent was thrown into chaos when Simon Cowell and Ant and Dec were forced to help a contestant who collapsed on stage. 
Luke was singing Frank Sinatra’s My Way with his mum Mary. 
But the singer, who’s in his 20s, had a fall and shocked the judges and presenters. 
As well as some help from Ant, Dec and Simon, a team of paramedics pulled him through too. Read More Britain's Got Talent was thrown into chaos (Photo: PA) Ant and Dec rushed to help the collapsed contestant (Photo: FameFlynet) 
An audience member told The Sun : “His grandad died that day and combined with the stress of auditions, it really got to him. 
“It was incredibly scary. Luke was singing with his mum and suddenly he just fell. 
”All of the judges jumped to their feet, and Simon rushed on stage. 
“Luke’s mum was cradling him in her arms. Read More Simon Cowell helped too (Photo: Birmingham Mail) What an eventful day! (Photo: Splash News) 
“They were the last act of the night and Simon thanked the audience for being compassionate.” 
BGT said Luke had fainted but was given the all-clear and told to rest. 
It’s unclear whether he got through to the next round of the show or not. 
*Britain’s Got Talent is back on ITV1 later this year Like us on Facebook
